verses.text: Mamin Jehová, tzach in b'itej yet' in wach' lolonel, yujto ix in a sik'q'ue vaan t'a skal in niwan yaelal, maj in a cha b'uchjoc yuj eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin.
Mamin, in Diosal ach, ix in k'an a colval, ix ak'an b'oxoc in k'ool.
Mamin, a ach ton ix in a colel t'a chamel. Ix ak' in q'uinal, maj in a chab'atlaj t'a skal eb' chamnac.
B'itananhec t'a Jehová, mach ex to schonhab' ex, b'itejec yujto anhej Te Nivan Yelk'ochi.
Yujto junnhej rato ay yoval sk'ool, haxo svach'k'olal aynhejek' t'a masanil tiempo. Wach'chom tzonh ok' t'ak'walil, haxo yic sq'uinhib'i sja co tzalajk'olal.
Ayic te wach' vaji, ix in na' icha tik: Malaj b'ak'uinh ol in telvoc yuj junok tas, xin chi.
Mamin Jehová, yuj val svach'il a k'ool, ix in ak'canoch b'aj malaj tas tzin ik'ani. Palta ayic ix ik'anel a b'a t'ayin, ix somchajcanel in k'ool.
Mamin, ix ach vavtej, ix valan in b'a t'ayach:

¿Tasto a ganar t'ayin, q'uinaloc tato tzin chami, tzin mucchaji? Manhxo ol yal-laj ach sb'itan eb' toxo ix och pococal. Manh ol yal pax laj yalan wach' lolonel eb' t'ayach yuj svach'il tas ix a b'o'o, xin chi.
Mamin Jehová, ab' val tas svala', ok'oc val a k'ool t'ayin. Mamin, ochannhej ved'oc.
Ix ak'an q'uexmaj in yaelal t'a tzalajk'olal. Ix ik'anel in cusk'olal, ix ak'ancanoch k'apac pichul yic q'uinh in pichuloc.
Yuj val chi' jun, ach Jehová in Diosal, max yal-laj vem numan. Tzin b'itan t'ayach t'a aloj wach' lolonel yet' ak'oj yuj diosal t'ayach t'a masanil tiempo.
